pkgmetadata.longdescription: Estimation and tests of hierarchical F-statistics // This R package allows the estimation of hierarchical F-statistics from haploid or diploid genetic data with any numbers of levels in the hierarchy, following the algorithm of Yang (Evolution, 1998, 52(4):950-956). Functions are also given to test via randomisations the significance of each F and variance components, using the likelihood-ratio statistics G -see Goudet etal (Genetics, 1996, 144(4): 1933-1940)
